DOC.brief_summary: The objective survey : 1 ) To examine safety/efficacy profile Januvia Korean participant , 2 ) To identify factor might influence safety efficacy profile Januvia Korean participant . Post-marketing survey consider applicable clinical trial thus result survey post conclusion . The result submit public health official require applicable national international law .
